remarks: Forward distributive law for endomorphism scalar product operation. (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2013.)
statement:
tendosp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendosp.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendosp.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendospdi1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( U ` ( F o. G ) ) = ( ( U ` F ) o. ( U ` G ) ) ) $.
